title: R For Molecular Medicine
text: This is the new website to host R teaching materials for the Cleveland Clinic Molecular Medicine PhD students.

title: Outline
text:
The topics we will cover include:

What is R?
What is RStudio?
What is Posit Workbench?
Installing and loading R packages

CRAN
Github
Bioconductor

Loading data

.xlsx
.csv
Other formats

Things to know about R

Case sensitive

Basic programming

Assigning objects
Functions
Vectors and sequences
Strings
Testing for equality

Manipulate dataframes

Indexing operators - extract rows/columns
Accessing variables in datasets
Subsetting data
Rename columns
Add columns
Group a continuous variable
Recategorize a categorical variable
Sort by row

Advanced programming

Writing custom functions
For loops/apply/map

Descriptive statistics

One-way frequency table
Two-way contingency table
Summary statistics
Summary statistics by group

Visualization

Scatterplot
Bar chart
Histogram
Line chart
Boxplot
Customization
